commit_list.message: Added capistrano to the mix
Added url to API
request inside before don't have effect, using :format => :xml (thanks @martinciu)
Should only return XML. Note that we also have NoticesController#locate inside this controller, but it should simply redirect.
Builder no longer needed by Notice model
Moving Notice#to_xml to NoticesController, since it's only required by Airbrake gem API
Updating comment with right method and URL
[#227] Page to redirect from notice ID to problem page, so we can now use the ID shown at 500.html inside monitored app.
[#227] Err creating now returns a XML with Err's ID (called "error code" by Airbrake gem), so now Errbit is compatible with the user informer feature.
Update README.mkdn

Added url to API
request inside before don't have effect, using :format => :xml (thanks @martinciu)
Should only return XML. Note that we also have NoticesController#locate inside this controller, but it should simply redirect.
